tooltip: Select Impa as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Impa focuses on improving the armor of Sheikah units.
Allows you to summon Impa, a melee hero with strong magic skill.
Impa can train Executioners, strong Melee units that ignore and damage enemy armor.
Non-magic armor of all non-creature, non-mechanical units is increased.
Trainees and Blademasters gain Shields, increasing all types of armor.
